description: Runtime resource dependency map for Ergatis components

runtime_categories.ergatis_script: Scripts from Ergatis install bin/ directory — included with Ergatis
runtime_categories.package_install: Hardcoded TIGR/JCVI/IGS software installation paths — need remapping
runtime_categories.os_binary: Standard OS/system binaries (perl, sort, mv, etc.)
runtime_categories.project_data: Project-specific paths baked into configs — test/example data, not runtime deps
runtime_categories.ergatis_runtime: Ergatis workflow runtime paths — resolved during execution
runtime_categories.package_config: Tool configuration files relative to package install
runtime_categories.url_fragment: URL fragments parsed as filesystem paths
runtime_categories.user_path: User home directory paths — should be parameterized
runtime_categories.template_var: Runtime config variables ({{VAR}}) — resolved from Ergatis global/component config

resources.note: Ergatis workflow runtime path — resolved at execution
Ergatis workflow runtime path — resolved at execution
Tool configuration file — relative to package install
User home directory — should be parameterized
